Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: In cases where any differences occur between the English version and the original Japanese version, the Japanese version shall prevail.This translation is subject to change without notice.Osaka Securities Exchange Co., Ltd. and/or Tokyo Stock Exchange Group, Inc., Tokyo Stock Exchange, Inc., Tokyo Stock Exchange Regulation, shall individually or jointly accept no responsibility or liability for damage or loss caused by any error, inaccuracy, misunderstanding, or changes with regard to this translation.Brokers will greatly benefit from lower transaction costs brought about by reductions in system investment and daily maintenance costs.I believe that this will offer more profit-making opportunities to investors and brokers.Listed companies can expect to benefit from greater convenience and efficiency of capital raisings with higher market liquidity and investment appeal.They will also be able to streamline various costs paid to exchanges.With regard to generating synergy, on page 4, the most important point would be "System Cost Synergies" listed at the bottom of the page.Our financial advisors have confirmed that there would be system cost synergies of approximately JPY 7 billion per year if we successfully integrate our systems.Of course, this means that it is generated gradually, not immediately in the next year.According to our calculations, the EPS would be positive for shareholders of both exchanges.Page 5 outlines the planned structure of the business combination.The business combination between TSEG and OSE will be conducted using a holding company structure.As you can see, the business combination process is divided into two steps.In Step 1, TSEG conducts a tender offer to purchase up to two-thirds of OSE common shares.The number of shares to be purchased is 179,999 shares.The lower limit shall be a majority shareholding of 135,001 shares.In Step 2, TSEG merges with OSE which will be the surviving company.The purchase price will be JPY 480,000 per common share as publicized this afternoon.The purchase is subject to the condition of the Japan Fair Trade Commission (JFTC)5DISCLAIMER: This translation may be used for reference purposes only
